attributes.action: To outlaw Religious Slaughter - Halal and Humane is animal Torture.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"Religious Slaughter - Halal and Humane"
Is barbaric and should be treated as a crime against animal welfare.

Cutting the throats of animals, that are tied up by their feet and left hanging from hooks from a ceiling, to die a slow death should be a crime like fox hunting.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " To outlaw Religious Slaughter - Halal and Humane is animal Torture."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14873.asp

Prime Minister's Office
